issues.message: Remove this conditional structure or edit its code blocks so that they're not all the same.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "foo.baz" 15 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "foo.biz" 3 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "foo.bar" 9 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "got valid=%v but wanted valid=%v: %v" 3 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "foo.baz.south" 3 times.
